title: Cool Earth theory sheds more light on diamonds

title_detail.value: Cool Earth theory sheds more light on diamonds

summary: A geologist has a new theory on the thermal evolution of Earth billions of years ago that explains why diamonds have formed as precious gemstones rather than just lumps of common graphite.

summary_detail.value: A geologist has a new theory on the thermal evolution of Earth billions of years ago that explains why diamonds have formed as precious gemstones rather than just lumps of common graphite.
